Figure 4 shows a plan view for a flower bed. Its shape is an equilateral triangle of
side x metres with three congruent rectangles attached to the triangle along its sides.
Each rectangle has length x metres and width y metres, as shown 1n Figure 4.

Given that the total area of the flower bed is 3m? and that 0 < x < 2.632 (3d.p.),

(a) show that the perimeter P metres, around the outside of the flower bed, is given by
the equation
